target.name: help
target.echo: A few questions related to your local environment.
This Phing will best work when having a local Virtual Host (vs. local website is under localhost)
Enter your local domain without 'www', e.g. example.local.
Enter the path where to find the database credentials. Default: configuration/Settings.php
Enter the path to TYPO3 CMS Core. Default: /t3core/typo3_src-6.2
Do you have a deployment server where to deploy? Enter true or false. Default: true
A few questions related to your remote server. Enter values if previously enter true for has.server.deployment
Enter the credentials to the server if relevant. Ex. user@domain.com
Enter the final domain without 'www' if relevant.
Enter the home directory of the remote (not necessarily the document root), e.g /sites/domain.com
Enter the path where to find the database credentials relative to remote.directory.home. Default: configuration/Settings.php
[NOTICE] A new file "configuration/PhingSettings.xml" has just been generated.
It may be a good idea to have a look at it and personalise it a bit...
Once being checked, run again this phing. It should look different.
